Html: I can't find this option anywhere, but it's possible I'm just dumb:  Is it possible to sort items in the ProtWarrior model by their total survival+mitigation?  Sorting by "overall" factors threat into the bargain, which (especially in regards to weapons and necklaces) tends to put a lot of higher-dps items in the mix with (or even on top of) actual tanking pieces.  Sorting by survival OR mitigation obviously takes threat out of the equation but you're still stuck doing the math instead of sorting by the best overall tanking items.
Turn the Threat Scale down. I wouldn't advise setting it to 0, because that would produce inaccurate results; you should set it as low as is necessary to reliably maintain aggro.
